name: Sonic Ms Requiem
description:
It's a Simple Fan Game of Sonic, but it bring the Stages of Sonic games for Master System, This "Alpha" Brings Act 1 and 2 of "Bridge Zone" of the game "Sonic the Hegdehog" for Master System, Soon, Jungle Zone will be In this Fan Game

Controls: 

Arrows - Move Sonic

Z - Jump

X - Run
